sense.def:
Horror
je močan občutek strahu, ki ga povzroči nekaj izjemno neprijetnega.

seg.quote: The boys shrank away in horror.

sense.def:
To have a horror of something
pomeni nečesa se bati ali do tistega čutiti velik odpor.

seg.quote: Despite a horror of violence, John allowed himself to be drafted into the army.

sense.def:
Zelo neprijetna doživetja lahko imenujemo
horrors
.

seg.quote: His mind would dwell on the horrors he had been through.

sense.def:
Film ali zgodba, ki je
horror
, naj bi izzvala močan strah.
